actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Felipe Cabral, Lucrecia Cabral, Juan Cabral, Carlos Eduardo Cabral, Leticia Cabrel, Maria de la Luz Cabral, and Maria Moreno Cabral.

summary.text: Declares seven named individuals to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Felipe Cabral, Lucrecia Cabral, Juan Cabral, Carlos Eduardo Cabral, Leticia Cabrel, Maria de la Luz Cabral, and Maria Moreno Cabral.
